short_summary: Purchase a modular Skin Characteristics Measurement System.
description: The department requires a Skin Characteristics Measurement System with delivery to Ottawa, ON on or before March 31, 2024. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.

full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement**
## Skin Characteristics Measurement System
Requires:
* Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment (UNSpsc: 41000000)

### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for a modular Skin Characteristics Measurement System. The system should be capable of delivering measurement results in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

#### Tender Requirements
Delivery Location: **National Capital Region (NCR) - Ottawa, ON**
Delivery Deadline: March 31, 2024

#### Tender Eligibility
All bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the RFP, including technical and commercial requirements.

#### Tender Closing Time
**Important Notice:**
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by **November 8, 2023, 14:00 EST**.

#### Selection Criteria
The successful bidder will be selected based on the **Lowest Price** criterion.

#### Notice of Opportunity
This notice relates to a competitive tender process. The tendering process was published in the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Adriana Gonzalez, PSPC/SPAC
adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Related Documents and Announcements
You can view the full RFP here: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17705115?extsite=MTc3MDUxMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17705115?extsite=MTc3MDUxMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

---
